description:
Children learn how to seasons come in, a brother’s greed leads to ruin, and an Ama no Jyaku gets tricked. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaze no Kami to Kodomo-tachi / Urushi no Kyoudai / Ama no Jaku to Warashi
The Wind God and the Children / The Lacquer Brothers / The Ama no Jyaku and the Child
風の神と子供たち / 漆の兄弟 / 天の邪鬼とわらし
